summary:
In my over 14 years of professional experience on accounting I have worked for several leading companies most of them within the E-commerce, telecommunications industry, Medical technology company. I have performed on companies such as Stryker (One of the World´s leading medical technology company), B2W Digital (biggest online retailer in Latin America), OI S.A (biggest Latin American telecommunication company) and Accenture. My duties included: General ledger account analyses and reconciliations; month-end procedures to meet deadlines, SOX compliance, external and internal audit responsibilities. My experience is strong in balance sheet analysis, monthly closing, financial statements, explanatory notes, management reports and financial reports.
I have an excellent knowledge on SAP, Oracle and also on Microsoft Office, mainly Excel.
